title: Love, but need gluten-free setting
text:
LOVE this idea, and looking forward to buying surprise bags. But since I‚Äôm truly gluten-sensitive, I can‚Äôt have baked goods, pasta, etc. I‚Äôm not Celiac, but I am sensitive enough to suffer pain and damage if I eat gluten.

So, it would be great to have that selection on my personal options. That way, if I pickup a surprise selection of sides for ex., I won‚Äôt end up with an otherwise yummy Mac & cheese that I can‚Äôt eat.  Thanks üôèüèΩ!

title: Could be much better
text: While I love what the devs made the app for, it needs a lot of support. I ordered from one restaurant that was actually in a strip club, yes a strip club. I went there on time and told the bouncers I came to pick up food I ordered and showed them the app. He said so many people have been coming but the restaurant no longer participates. The app has no phone number to call, so can only email. I did that, hoping to hear back from someone at least within 48hrs max, it‚Äôs been two weeks. Of course I had to just call my credit card company in order to get the money back. Support is lacking big time.

title: No refund if food not picked up
text:
From my first and probably last experience with this app. You need to show up on time to get your bag. No earlier or later. They don't refund or credit your account if the pick up didn't happen for whatever reason because the food "would end up in trash" assuming that employees or other charities won't take it.

If I knew their policy before, I would let that food go wastes because I wouldn't want my money to go on waste neither.

title: Awesome!

title: Delicious app

title: App changed my life
text: My family likes to save money and we usually go to Costco. We no longer do that as often because we use TooGoodToGo - we use this multiple times a week and are happy to finally support our local merchants. We would never be normal shoppers but this now introduces us to them and we feel the need to now perhaps patron them since they offer too good to go. Also, my wife doesn‚Äôt like the meals, she thinks the best deal is groceries. I agree - it‚Äôs fundamentally changed how we shop for groceries but honestly donuts are so good and a quick meal when it‚Äôs just me finding something to eat. I‚Äôm not picky! Keep up the good work Too Good To Go - we‚Äôll use you for life!

title: I was so hungry

I‚Äôm so happy the food didn‚Äôt go to waste and I didn‚Äôt have to hungry that night. The staff were super friendly too which added a cherry ontop. I love this app!!

title: Great concept to Reward Prevention of Waste!
text:
This is such a wonderful way to help small businesses from having to waste and throw away food! At the same time the customer gets a reward in the way of a discount for desired treats and food. It‚Äôs a win-win! We all love the surprise of a grab bag. 

Looking forward to more businesses joining to provide a greater variety and more options.

title: Metro Meat Market in Forest Hills
text:
Delicious meal of sliced sausage in garlic and oil with pasta shells and broccolini! Nice sized container of food! Enough for two people! Just add a glass of wine to your meal! I love the idea of not wasting food and making good food available to the general public at reduced prices!

I will definitely use the App again and see what else I can enjoy!

title: Terrible App, Terrible Customer Service
text: TGTG is a good idea gone wrong. From the condescending behavior of shop owners treating TGTG customers like beggars, to the terrible customer service provided by the TGTG, this app‚Äôs expiration is closer than ever. Stay away at all costs
